Authors: Meiryani, Bening D.A., Warganegara D.L., Pertiwi S.A.
Title: The influence of employer reputation and professional recognition on student interest become public accountant
Affiliations: Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Doctoral Program, BINUS Business School, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; International Relations Department, Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, Universitas Prof. Dr. Moestopo (Beragama), Jakarta, 10270, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Meiryani, Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Bening, D.A., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Warganegara, D.L., Doctoral Program, BINUS Business School, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Pertiwi, S.A., International Relations Department, Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, Universitas Prof. Dr. Moestopo (Beragama), Jakarta, 10270, Indonesia
Abstract: This researh aims to analysis the effect of employer reputation and professional recognition on student interest in choosing careers become a public accountant. The research method used is quantitative with data analysis using SEM (Structural Equation Modeling) with the Lisrel program). The results of data analysis using path analysis, obtained t = 7.42, because t> 1.96, it can be concluded that there is a positive influence of employers reputation and professional recognition simultaneously on student interest in choosing careers to become public accountants meaning that there is significant and professional recognition simultaneously on students' interests in choosing careers to become public accountants. © 2020 EManuscript Technologies. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Employer Reputation; Professional Recognition; Public Accountant; Student Interest
Index Keywords: article; career; data analysis; employer; human; path analysis
